# MoreFusion

> Free AI tools, calculators, and tech guides to boost your workflow.

## Tools
- [BMI Calculator](/bmi-calculator): Calculate Body Mass Index.
- [Resume Maker](/resume-maker): Build ATS-friendly resumes.
- [EMI Calculator](/emi-calculator): Calculate loan EMIs.
- [PDF Tools](/tools/pdf-tools): Merge, split, compress, and convert PDFs.
- [Image Tools](/tools/image-tools): Convert and optimize images.

## Blog
- Tech guides, AI tool reviews, and productivity tips.
- [Latest Posts](/blog)
